summary: An ordinance authorizing the City Treasurer to direct the deposit of $955,000 Seattle Refunding Bonds, dated July 1, 1910, with the Trust Company of America, New York City, and further authorizing and directing the city treasurer to instruct said company as to the delivery of said bonds and the remittance of the purchase price thereof, and providing for the manner in which the city treasurer shall account for such transaction in the official records in his office.
